definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: usu. stop up, in sense of shut out, shut ears against (late ‖ form of [[סָתַם]]; yet awkward; Ba:ES 9 cp. Ar. 4amata frustrate, disappoint);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[תְּפִלָּתִי]] ´[[שׂ]]: La 3:8 (> van d. H. [[שָׂתָם]]) he  (´[[י]]:) hath shut out my prayer (Bu ´[[מתּ]] :´[[שׂ]]: shut up [himself] from).
